title: New Winos 4.0 Malware Infects Gamers Through Malicious Game Optimization Apps
description: Cybersecurity researchers are warning that a command-and-control (C&C) framework called Winos is being distributed within gaming-related applications like installation tools, speed boosters, and optimization utilities.
